title: Bug 18934: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example, the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved around, but they do not have any effect. This is misleading, especially when opening a small image like an icon.
EB: In the ImageAnalyzer example, the scrollbars should be disabled so that they do not mislead the user when they are not functional.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only). 
2. Open the ImageAnalyzer example. 
3. Observe that the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved but do not have any effect, even when opening a small image like an icon.
